events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving a rear-end collision on highway 54, request to initiate claim.
The submitted claim was categorised under Auto Accident following review of reported keywords and accident description.
Assigned agent John Davis to handle the auto accident claim for prompt and effective customer assistance.
Claim acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and explanation of next steps.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimate documents from the claimant.
Received all requested documents including detailed police report and vehicle damage photos from the claimant.
Initiated an internal investigation to verify the details of the auto accident and assess liability factors.
Completed review of all evidence related to the collision, including witness statements and traffic camera footage.
Proposed a settlement amount based on repair costs and injury claims to the customer for their review and approval.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and requested clarification on payment timelines.
Auto accident claim officially approved following customer agreement to the settlement terms detailed earlier.
Issued payment for the approved claim amount directly to the designated repair shop and medical providers.
Closed the claim file after confirmation that all payments were received and the customer was satisfied.
Archived the auto accident claim documents and investigation records for long-term storage and compliance.
